last_episode_to_air.name: The Stuff of Nightmares
last_episode_to_air.overview: A 14-year-old disappears in Aruba while on a jet ski ride with an older man; a man kidnaps a young woman from the parking lot of her boyfriend's apartment building.

name: Still a Mystery
overview: Each episode re-examines a single crime case where unanswered questions still remain. Through original interviews those involved, the evidence is dissected and new theories are presented in a quest to uncover the truth.

episodes.name: The Dangerous Houses
episodes.overview: Eighteen-year-old Brookelyn Farthing disappears in 2013 after attending a party in Berea, Ky.; 24-year-old realtor Lindsay Buziak is found brutally killed after showing new clients a million-dollar home.

episodes.name: Down The Hill
episodes.overview: Thirteen-year-old Abby Williams and 14-year-old Libby German disappear while hiking on a popular trail; 13-year-old Dylan Redwine vanishes over Thanksgiving break while visiting his father in Vallecito, Colo.

episodes.name: The Midnight Murders
episodes.overview: Florida insurance agent Carla Stefaniak vanishes in Costa Rica; 19-year-old college student Pravin Varughese disappears after a party in 2014.

episodes.name: Secrets in the Cars
episodes.overview: After a night out with friends, Jaleayah Davis, 20, is found dead; Kelsie Schelling, 21, drives two hours to show her boyfriend a sonogram of their baby, but never makes it home.

episodes.name: The Gone Girls
episodes.overview: In Mobile, Ala., young mother Danniella Vian, 25, disappears into thin air; 19-year-old Holly Moore's suspicious death still raises questions four years after her body is found hanging in her closet

episodes.name: The Party Murders
episodes.overview: Their evenings begin as fun celebrations with friends but they end in murder. With disturbing evidence, terrifying theories, and demands for justice, can the mystery of how two young partygoers are murdered be solved?

episodes.name: Terror After Midnight
episodes.overview: A young Hollywood celebrity is out celebrating her birthday and another young woman enjoys a late drink with friends, just a few hours later, they both end up dead and investigators try to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: Brides and Murder
episodes.overview: Two young brides-to-be are just beginning to plan their weddings when their dreams are tragically cut short. Can desperate calls made to 911 reveal the truth about their shocking deaths?

episodes.name: She Gave No Warning
episodes.overview: When two young women vanish without a trace, investigators are haunted by the things they leave behind - a car with the keys still in the ignition, a pair of shoes, and a coat. They disappear with no warning. Where have they gone?

episodes.name: Young Love Gone Wrong
episodes.overview: They are head over heels in love with their whole lives ahead still ahead of them, but then they die suddenly under suspicious circumstances. Could the strange text messages that come from their own phones hold the clues that investigators need?

episodes.name: TV Dreams Cut Short
episodes.overview: Two young women who dream of big success as television anchors are just embarking on their careers when their plans come to a violent end. They are murdered in their own apartments and there are no signs of forced entry. Did they know their killers?

episodes.name: Killers Among Us?
episodes.overview: A respected police officer heads home after a late shift, and a young man who has just moved into his own place relaxes after watching football. How do these routine evenings turn deadly? Were their killings cold-blooded assassinations?

episodes.name: Innocence Interrupted
episodes.overview: The murders of a teenage boy who never returns home from school and a teenage girl who is ambushed as she sits in a car with friends devastate their communities. It is every parent's worst nightmare - who would kill two innocent teenagers?

episodes.name: Who Pulled the Trigger?
episodes.overview: They are the victims of shootings that seem senseless. Who would want them dead? Did these two young people get tangled up with the wrong crowds? And will anyone be held accountable for their murders?

episodes.name: The Hidden Bodies
episodes.overview: After struggles in their youth, they are setting out on new paths with new hope but then the unthinkable happens. Their horrific murders are chilling. Who would kill them in such a violent way? Did they have any idea how much danger they were in?

episodes.name: Why Did She Leave?
episodes.overview: She is an innocent bride-to-be; he's a six-year-old schoolboy. Both are on the road, away from home, when they disappear. When her car and body are found, will the clues lead to her murderer? And will his family ever solve the mystery of his vanishing?

episodes.name: The Hidden Clues
episodes.overview: Two 20-year-olds suffer personal tragedies then have their own lives abruptly snuffed out. He's shot while hanging out with friends; she disappears, only to turn up dead in a staged suicide. Will their families be able to prove what really happened?

episodes.name: Eyes on Her
episodes.overview: Two young women are savagely murdered. One has gone fishing only to turn up beaten and drowned, and the other is a pregnant mother attacked while on the job delivering newspapers. Are strangers responsible, or are the culprits much closer to home?

episodes.name: Guns and Secrets
episodes.overview: One young woman is found with a shotgun wound to her head shortly after moving in with her new boyfriend. Then, a couple planning their wedding are gunned down in their own backyard. Will secrets from the past explain these unimaginable deaths?

episodes.name: Death and Silence
episodes.overview: The body of a young musician turns up in an alley. Police learn she's been spending time with an older man. Did he play a part in her murder? And when a construction worker disappears on the job, his coworkers' accounts don't add up. What are they hiding?

episodes.name: Clues Caught on Camera
episodes.overview: A mother of three is gunned down in a church basement where she's set to teach a fitness class. Police find surveillance video showing a figure in full police body armor stalking the floor in the lead-up to the slaughter. Who is this craven killer?

episodes.name: My Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Sisters seek justice for their siblings - but the truth might be deadly.

episodes.name: In Her Own Home
episodes.overview: Home becomes the most dangerous place on earth for two lovely young women.

episodes.name: Targeted in the Night
episodes.overview: A girl vanishes on her way home, and an entrepreneur dies after a fight.

episodes.name: Murdered in Broad Daylight
episodes.overview: A brazen public stabbing and a house fire snuff out the lives of two women.

episodes.name: Depths of Depravity
episodes.overview: The callously dismembered body of a missing woman turns up in trash bags.

episodes.name: Who Wanted Him Dead?
episodes.overview: A war veteran turns up dead, and a missing man leaves a creepy voicemail.

episodes.name: Best Lives Cut Short
episodes.overview: A beer entrepreneur is gunned down, and two friends die while on vacation.

episodes.name: New Beginnings Violent Endings
episodes.overview: A man relocates only to be stabbed. A student is found dead in her car.

episodes.name: He Didn't Have to Die
episodes.overview: A man and his dog burn to death. A chase ends in murder for a motorist.

episodes.name: Somebody Knows Something
episodes.overview: A severed foot is an ominous clue in the case of a missing mother of five.

episodes.name: Small Town Secrets
episodes.overview: A man's trip ends badly. A missing mom's search party sparks suspicion.

episodes.name: Charmed by a Killer
episodes.overview: One mom is missing and another spurs a manhunt for her daughter's killer.

episodes.name: Suspects at Large
episodes.overview: In an ironic twist, a woman vanishes while looking for her missing friend.

episodes.name: Southern Secrets
episodes.overview: When two women die suddenly under mysterious circumstances, authorities initially suspect suicide. But both of their families believe it was murder, and are trying to figure out who is responsible.

episodes.name: She Turns Up Dead
episodes.overview: A mother of two and a young woman planning a career in science both die under mysterious circumstances, and two families embark on quests for justice.

episodes.name: More Than Meets The Eye
episodes.overview: The murder-suicide of a mother and son may be something entirely different.

episodes.name: The Death Of Innocence
episodes.overview: A family suspects foul play when their son drowns in a few inches of water.

episodes.name: North Carolina Unsolved
episodes.overview: A rookie police officer is heard confronting someone with a gun and is shot in the back of the head, but the D.A. believes it's suicide. And when a Navy veteran is discovered with wounds all over his body, police oddly think he died of pneumonia.

episodes.name: Where The Clues Lead
episodes.overview: He seems like a great partner. But when Susan Osborne and her 14-year-old son Evan disappear, it turns out "Mr. Right" has a secret. Then, when a young man is shot in a street confrontation, all clues point to one man. Could this case be that simple?

episodes.name: Far From Home
episodes.overview: A young woman's body is found 200 miles from home, and a retired police detective uses his podcast to crowd-source the search for her killer. And, when a young mother disappears, an old answering machine message could hold the key to finding her murderer.

episodes.name: Missing Blue Eyes
episodes.overview: Someone snatches a baby boy from his crib, and a young mom goes missing.

episodes.name: A Community Betrayal
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old boy vanishes, but neighbors don't tell police what they know.

episodes.name: The Silent Witnesses
episodes.overview: A young woman on a trip to her father's homeland goes missing, then turns up brutally murdered. Another young mother and her baby are shot as they drive along a highway.

episodes.name: Taken Before Graduation
episodes.overview: Officers discover a high school senior's strangled body in flames weeks before graduation.

episodes.name: Danger at Close Range
episodes.overview: A bride-to-be vanishes weeks before her wedding. Suspicion swirls around her fiancé and ex-boyfriend, before a shocking revelation about a coworker makes him the main person of interest. Then, the mysterious death of a young trans woman.

episodes.name: Indiana Unsolved
episodes.overview: A college student sends his sister a mysterious text about leaving the country. Later, his body turns up in a lake, weighed down by a backpack full of rocks. A young woman vanishes after trying to make a call from a payphone.

episodes.name: The Party's Over
episodes.overview: A young woman acts erratically at a restaurant and police take her into custody. They release her in the middle of the night(—)and she disappears. A soldier at Fort Hood dies after falling off a balcony. Was it an accident, suicide or murder?

episodes.name: Suspicious Circumstances
episodes.overview: The families of two young mothers who die in suspicious circumstances search for answers. Racheyl Brinson's husband says she fell to her death while hunting, while Jessica Alva's boyfriend tells police that she hung herself.

episodes.name: What the Trees Know
episodes.overview: A Georgia man suffers 17 stab wounds while on a hunting trip, and authorities rule his death a suicide, shocking his family. Another man disappears without warning -- the only clue is his burned-out car, found 14 hours from where anyone saw him last.

episodes.name: Suffer the Children
episodes.overview: Oakley Carlson is missing and no one can find her, including her foster parents and her biological parents; a young mother leaves a bar with a man she doesn't know and ends up dead.

episodes.name: Secrets in the DNA
episodes.overview: A truck driver finds an unconscious woman on a Missouri motorway, and police determine the suspect attacked her elsewhere and placed her on the road; an unknown killer bludgeons a mum and her daughters at home while her son and nephew cling to life.

episodes.name: Unseen Enemies
episodes.overview: The murder of billionaire couple Barry and Honey Sherman in their mansion stuns Toronto, since Barry is a pharmaceutical mogul with many enemies, but it is unclear who would kill his wife; a New York teen disappears after a mysterious road trip.

episodes.name: The Stuff of Nightmares
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old disappears in Aruba while on a jet ski ride with an older man; a man kidnaps a young woman from the parking lot of her boyfriend's apartment building.
